bibl.title: Two Greek Ostraka.
Antidoron Martino David oblatum. Miscellanea Papyrologica
bibl.author: Lewis, Naphtali

bibl.note: Purchased by the author in Luxor. - I. List of hemerophylakes. Probably mid-second century A.D. - II. List of words and names. Third century A.D. (?).
E. Boswinkel, B.A. van Groningen et P.W. Pestman (Edd.), Antidoron Martino David oblatum. Miscellanea Papyrologica = Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XVII (Leiden, 1968) pp. 53-55.
